name: Trifle
description:
Hello There! Trifle is a puzzle game, It goal to entertain players by hosting puzzles. Currently there are only puzzles in the game, mini-games and more will be added later.  Controls Just replace the puzzles position.

System Requirements and Information

The game has been developed at a level that can open even the worst devices. You can contact us about all the bugs, suggestions and complaints you find in the game from the Discord section.   Discord : ichuusy#5823
